author: Reuters Editorial
title: Average yields fall on Egypt's 6-month, 1-year T-bills - c.bank
text:
CAIRO, March 8 (Reuters) - Average yields on Egyptâ€™s six-month and one-year treasury bills fell at an auction on Thursday, data from the central bank showed.
The yield on the 182-day bill fell to 17.751 percent from 17.907 percent at the last similar auction, and the yield on the 357-day bill fell to 16.587 percent from 16.894 percent. (Reporting by Arwa Gaballa; Editing by Toby Chopra)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
